mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.observation

Class ObservationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.DaoHelper<Observation>
      • mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.observation.ObservationHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDaoHelper<Observation>, IEventDispatcher<IObservationEventListener>

    public class ObservationHelper
extends DaoHelper<Observation>
implements IEventDispatcher<IObservationEventListener>
    A utility class for accessing Observation data from the physical data model. The details of ORM DAOs and Lazy Loading should not be exposed past this class.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.datastore.DaoHelper
